title: Ep. 220: Makeup for Men, Our Podcasting Secrets & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 220: Makeup for Men, Our Podcasting Secrets & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: There’s a new makeup line for men, but do cosmetics still need to be gendered? We discuss and then answer a listener question about how we create the podcast each week. Plus, lots of beauty news to talk about: The “Keurig of skincare” is coming this fa...
description:
There’s a new makeup line for men, but do cosmetics still need to be gendered? We discuss and then answer a listener question about how we create the podcast each week. Plus, lots of beauty news to talk about: The “Keurig of skincare” is coming this fall; Gucci Bloom launched a new campaign; perfumers re-created a 150-year-old fragrance discovered in a shipwreck; and researchers have figured out what goosebumps are good for. We also Raise A Wand to our current obsessions—and listen to a few of your favorites, too! -- Want more Fat Mascara? Take our listener survey: fatmascara.com/survey; Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email : info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
